Method Detail

addArticles

public void addArticles(java.lang.String lexisdoc)
                 throws java.io.IOException
addArticles method parses a document of lexis-nexis querries (in html format) and adds the articles as instances to this Relation

Parameters:
the - file path name, must be in HTML format
Throws:
java.io.IOException

newDoc

public void newDoc(java.lang.String Date,
                   java.lang.String description)
            throws java.io.IOException
New Doc creates a new ARFF document with the relation header. The document name will be equal to the value of the field "docName"

Parameters:
date - String-representation of the date created
description-a - comment describing what this relation does, will appear as a comment in the header
Throws:
java.io.IOException

tabDel2arff

public void tabDel2arff(java.lang.String tabName,
                        java.lang.String Date,
                        java.lang.String description,
                        java.lang.String[] atNames,
                        java.lang.String[] atTypes)
                 throws java.io.IOException
tabDel2arff converts a tab delimited file to the arff file format. Note: only supports String and Numeric types, use the Numeric to Nominal Filter after applying to convert the numeric vectors.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
